entry.title: Errors creating support cases
entry.content:
May 17, 1:55 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

May 17, 1:44 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented, and we are monitoring the results.

May 17, 1:22 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue creating support cases with our Support Center. New support case submissions are failing while appearing to have been successfully created.

entry.title: Elevated error rates across multiple services
entry.content:
Sep 23, 19:18 UTC
Postmortem - A root-cause analysis for this issue has been performed and is now available at [https://cdn.auth0.com/blog/20220915\_Increased\_Errors\_for\_Public\_and\_Private\_Cloud\_Customers.pdf](https://cdn.auth0.com/blog/20220915_Increased_Errors_for_Public_and_Private_Cloud_Customers.pdf).

Sep 15, 15:44 UTC
Resolved - This issue has now been resolved, and service has been restored. We apologize for the impact this has had on you and your users.

Sep 15, 12:50 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 15, 12:18 UTC
Identified - An increase in error rates has been identified. We are continuing to investigate.

Sep 15, 11:34 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 15, 11:21 UTC
Identified - We have identified a service disruption with our edge provider which is impacting our core authentication and Management API services. More information will be provided shortly.
